org.finra.herd.rest

Class TagRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.finra.herd.rest.TagRestController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/rest",
                produces={"application/xml","application/json"})
public class TagRestController
extends Object
    The REST controller that handles tag REST requests.

        @RequestMapping(value="/tags",
                method=POST,
                consumes={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Secured(value="FN_TAGS_POST")
public Tag createTag(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                  TagCreateRequest tagCreateRequest)
        Creates a new tag.
        Parameters:
        tagCreateRequest - the information needed to create the tag
        Returns:
        the created tag type

      • getTags

        @RequestMapping(value="/tags/tagTypes/{tagTypeCode}",
                method=GET)
 @Secured(value="FN_TAGS_ALL_GET")
public TagListResponse getTags(@PathVariable(value="tagTypeCode")
                                                                                                                                                    String tagTypeCode,
                                                                                                                                                    @RequestParam(value="tagCode",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                    String tagCode)
        Retrieves all associated tags for the specified tag type code. When tagCode is null, return all tags of the tag type code, which has no parent (i.e. root tags). When tagCode is provided, return all tags of the tag type code and whose parent tag code is tagCode.
        Parameters:
        tagTypeCode - the tag type's code.
        tagCode - the parent tag code.
        Returns:
        all associated tags, with parent, itself and the children tags with has more children flag.

      • searchTags

        @RequestMapping(value="/tags/search",
                method=POST,
                consumes={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Secured(value="FN_TAGS_SEARCH_POST")
public TagSearchResponse searchTags(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                               TagSearchRequest request,
                                                                                                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="fields",required=false,defaultValue="")
                                                                                                                                                                                                               Set<String> fields)
        Retrieves all tags existing in the system per specified search filters and keys. For each tag entity, this endpoint returns tag key by default along with any other top-level elements as specified by the "fields" query string parameter. The list of tags returned by this endpoint is sorted alphabetically by tag's display name ascending.
        Parameters:
        request - the tag search request. The request can only accept a single search filter and a single search key
        fields - the field options for the tag type search response. The valid field options are: displayName, description, parentTagKey, hasChildren
        Returns:
        the tag search response

      • updateTag

        @RequestMapping(value="/tags/tagTypes/{tagTypeCode}/tagCodes/{tagCode}",
                method=PUT,
                consumes={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Secured(value="FN_TAGS_PUT")
public Tag updateTag(@PathVariable(value="tagTypeCode")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String tagTypeCode,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          @PathVariable(value="tagCode")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String tagCode,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          TagUpdateRequest tagUpdateRequest)
        Updates an existing tag.
        Parameters:
        tagTypeCode - the tag type code
        tagCode - the tag code
        tagUpdateRequest - the information needed to update the tag
        Returns:
        the updated tag
